title: Science Job Competency Enhancement Program through Open Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: BYOD environment leveraging learners' personal devices for practical competency development through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners design three or more learning pathways that apply Open Educational Practices (OEP) to solve real-life problems in science.
Learners complete a project where they collaborate with experts/peers via digital networks to collect and analyze scientific experimental data.
Learners develop two or more case studies on solving science-related job problems using Open Educational Resources (OER) in a mobile microlearning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
